subtitle: Daily snapshots are created automatically and kept for up to 7 days. You can also create manual backups anytime.
tooltipInfo: This backup has been successfully restored
modalTitle: Are you sure you want to create a new backup?
modalSubtitle: A new backup will be created using the current system data.

theVersionSaved: The version saved in this backup will be loaded.
